alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:38PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lauderdale and northwestern Colbert Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 438 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Iuka, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Margerum and Wright. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
